特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
関連科目: 異文化コミュニケーション(Ａ)／The Study of Intercultural Communication A
授業方法:
• Utilize a wide variety of approach and experiential and interactive activities during the class and focus on student-driven exploration
• Utilize case studies and critical incidents to provide a deeper understanding of the contents and enhance the ability to apply critical thinking
• Work individual, pair or group on topics that relate to contents
• Encouraged to reflect their learning by writing journals

第1回: Introduction to the course, Students self-introduction, Simulation activity for business intercultural communication and debrief & discussion
第2回:
The nature of intercultural communication and competencies (Skills, Knowledge & Attitudes)
Core cultural values and implications for business, Cultural stereotypes and generalizations
Read assigned reading and prepare for class discussion
第3回: Working in a multicultural team – “A World of Difference: Working Successfully Across Cultures” Part 1(with DVD scenes)
Read assigned reading and prepare for class discussion.
第4回: Working in a multicultural team – “A World of Difference: Working Successfully Across Cultures” Part 2(with DVD scenes)
Read assigned reading and prepare for class discussion.
第5回: Working in a multicultural team – “A World of Difference: Working Successfully Across Cultures” Part 3(with DVD scenes)
Read assigned reading and prepare for class discussion.
第6回: Communicating across cultures – Style, pace, and nonverbal cues
Read assigned reading and prepare for class discussion.
第7回: Building trusting relationship in cross-cultural collaborations
Read assigned reading and prepare for class discussion.
第8回: Read assigned reading and prepare for class discussion.
第9回: Working with Japan (1) - Understand Japanese business culture on their own terms and find the way to bridge the gap
Read assigned reading and prepare for class discussion.
第10回: Working with Japan (2) - Understand business practices and customs in Japan Critical incidents analysis
Read assigned reading and prepare for class discussion.
第11回:
Cross-cultural leadership; Women in leadership
Discussion with a guest speaker
Read assigned reading and prepare for class discussion.
第12回:
Cross-cultural negotiation: Understanding negotiation process and strategies
Case study analysis and discussion
Read assigned reading and prepare for class discussion.
第14回:
Students’ presentations
Intercultural competence: Summary and reflections of the course
